definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Objective To analyse function of left ventricle among patients with left-right shunt congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析左向右分流型先天性心臟病左心室功能。

sentences.english: The cure of congenital aplastic anemia and general again block is same.
sentences.chinese: 先天性再生障礙性貧血的治療與一般再障相同。

sentences.english: Objective To review the surgical treatment of 681 infants with congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結681例嬰幼兒先天性心臟病外科治療經驗。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical character of congenital pulmonary hypoplasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討先天性肺發育不全的臨牀特徵。

sentences.english: To evaluate the effect of excision of the fistulous tract in the treatment of congenital lacrimal sac fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估淚囊瘻摘除術治療先天性淚囊瘻的效果。

sentences.english: Conclusions There is pathological oxygen supply dependance in the patients with several congenital cardiac disease.
sentences.chinese: 結論重症先天性心臟病手術期間存在病理性氧供依賴。

sentences.english: A special medical device for the treatment of congenital megacolon is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計一種用於治療先天性巨結腸的專用醫療器材。

sentences.english: This is why congenital abnormalities in the region of the neck may be symptomless for years.
sentences.chinese: 這就是先天性頸部畸形可以多年無症狀的原因。

sentences.english: Congenital calcaneovalgus is a very common postural deformity of the neonate.
sentences.chinese: 先天性跟骨外翻是新生兒最常見的姿勢畸形之一。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the value of ultrasound in diagnosis of congenital renal malformations.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲診斷胎兒先天性腎臟畸形的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnostic methods for agenesis of gallbladder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討先天性膽囊缺如的診斷方法。

sentences.english: An implant and an all-ceramic crown restored the site of a congenitally missing lateral incisor.
sentences.chinese: 使用植體及全瓷冠修復先天性缺失的側切牙。

sentences.english: This particular gorilla demonstrates syndactyly of the third and fourth toes, a common congenital malformation also found in humans.
sentences.chinese: 人類中也發現過這種類型的先天性畸形。

sentences.english: Congenital ventricular diverticulum is a rare cardiac malformation.
sentences.chinese: 先天性心室憩室是一種少見的心臟畸形。

sentences.english: Human cytomegalovirus(HCMV) is the most frequent congenitally infected virus.
sentences.chinese: 人鉅細胞病毒是人類最常見的先天性感染病毒。

sentences.english: Conclusion Large-scale congenital persistent pupillary membrane can be treated by microsurgery.
sentences.chinese: 結論較大範圍的先天性瞳孔殘膜可應用顯微手術治療。

definition: to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
heredity/to inherit (a trait)/to pass on (to one's offspring)
